amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 10 of the bill which provides for establishment and approval of small business concern size standards by the chief counsel for advocacy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
